Address.label: Address
Address.value: 421 W. 3RD STREET,SUITE 1000, FORT WORTH, Texas, 76102, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: HighPeak Energy Inc is an independent oil & natural gas company focused on the development of unconventional oil and natural gas reserves in primarily Howard County of the Midland Basin. The company operates in a single segment, which is oil and natural gas development, exploration, and production.
